author: Ioan-Popovici
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
- Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template:

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Install-Module -Name pswmitoolkit -force
Import-Module -Name pswmitoolkit
$Module = Get-Module -Name pswmitoolkit
$Module.HelpInfoUri
Update-Help -Module pswmitoolkit -force
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```
Update help files
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
Update-Help : Failed to update Help for the module(s) 'pswmitoolkit' with UI culture(s) {en-US} : Unable to retrieve the HelpInfo XML file for UI culture en-US. Make sure the HelpInfoUri property in the module manifest is valid or    
check your network connection and then try the command again.                                                       
At line:1 char:1                                                                                                     
+ Update-Help -Module pswmitoolkit -force                                                                            
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : ResourceUnavailable: (:) [Update-Help], Exception                                          
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : UnableToRetrieveHelpInfoXml,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.UpdateHelpCommand
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none
Name                            Value                 
----                            -----                  
PSVersion                       5.1.14393.1944        
PSEdition                       Desktop                
PSCompatibleVersions            {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                    10.0.14393.1944        
CLRVersion                      4.0.30319.42000        
WSManStackVersion               3.0                    
PSRemotingProtocolVersion       2.3                    
SerializationVersion            1.1.0.1                
```

Works locally
----------------
This works fine locally though

```powershell
Import-Module -Name 'D:\GitHub\PSWmiToolKit\PSWmiToolKit\PSWmiToolKit.psd1'                
$Module = Get-Module -Name PSWmiToolKit
$Module.HelpInfoUri                                                    
Update-Help -Module PSWmiToolKit -Force -Verbose
VERBOSE: Your connection has been redirected to the following URI: "http://pswmitoolkit.updatable-help.com/
VERBOSE: Performing the operation "Update-Help" on target "PSWmiToolKit, Current Version: 1.0.0.1, Available Version:   1.0.0.1, UICulture: en-US".                                                                                             VERBOSE: PSWmiToolKit: Updated D:\GitHub\PSWmiToolKit\PSWmiToolKit\en-US\about_PSWmiToolKit.help.txt. Culture en-US     Version 1.0.0.1
VERBOSE: PSWmiToolKit: Updated D:\GitHub\PSWmiToolKit\PSWmiToolKit\en-US\PSWmiToolkit-help.xml. Culture en-US Version   1.0.0.1                                                                                                                 
```

Links
----------------

[GitHub Link](https://github.com/JhonnyTerminus/PSWmiToolKit)
[Update Uri](http://pswmitoolkit.updatable-help.com/)
[Updatable help files](https://github.com/JhonnyTerminus/PSWmiToolKit/tree/master/docs/help/updatable)
[Module manifest](https://github.com/JhonnyTerminus/PSWmiToolKit/blob/master/PSWmiToolKit/PSWmiToolKit.psd1)

Screenshoots
----------------
![screenclip](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17069425/36207271-97c714d8-1195-11e8-977a-bc8c709210ab.png)
![screenclip2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17069425/36207272-97e31e44-1195-11e8-84e2-cff4e4854106.png)

)
title: Update-Help does not work on custom PSGallery modules, but works locally
